title: Opinion: AMA CEO: Deepfake doctors are a threat to public health
description: Highly respected doctors on social media are endorsing questionable medical products — but they’re deepfakes, and they’re a serious problem.
content: Highly respected doctors on social media are endorsing questionable medical products — but they’re deepfakes, and they’re a serious problem.
